content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
The structure has a total of 9 blocks and consists of 3 layers:
- Bottom layer: 2 orange cylinders and 1 yellow rectangular block as a base
- Middle layer: 1 yellow rectangular block as a platform
- Top layer: 2 blue rectangular blocks, 1 red rectangular block, and 2 orange triangular roof pieces

## Spatial Relationships:
- Bottom layer: Two orange vertical cylinders side by side on top of a horizontal yellow rectangular block
- Middle layer: A horizontal yellow rectangular block resting on top of the two cylinders
- Top layer: 
  - Two vertical blue rectangular blocks at the left and right sides
  - One vertical red rectangular block in the middle between the blue blocks
  - Two orange triangular roof pieces forming a peaked roof on top

# Required Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on the analysis, I need the following blocks:
- 2 orange cylinders (block #10)
- 2 yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (block #7)
- 2 blue vertical rectangular blocks (block #6)
- 1 red vertical rectangular block (block #2)
- 2 orange triangular roof pieces (block #15 and #16)

List of block indices: 10, 10, 7, 7, 6, 6, 2, 15, 16

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7
    Step2: Move block with index 10
    Step3: Move block with index 10
    Step4: Move block with index 7
    Step5: Move block with index 6
    Step6: Move block with index 2
    Step7: Move block with index 6
    Step8: Move block with index 15
    Step9: Move block with index 16
}
```

The assembly follows a bottom-up approach, starting with the base platform, adding the cylinders, then the middle platform, followed by the house structure, and finally the roof pieces.
